Posts.Title: PLEASE HELP ME!! Mom is diagnosed with Stage IV Breast Cancer Trust Trust

Posts.Content: Trust wrote: Hi, I really need your advice and help..Im extremely worried to say the least.  Well long story short..Mom has bone mets, liver mets, and brain mets (treated by WBR)...She was on Taxol, Herceptin, Gemzar and Zometa.  May of this year she stopped the Taxol due to horrible side effects..she had been getting it since Oct 2010,....She continued the rest of the meds...June the Pet Scan revealed a suspicious "SUV" rating near her lungs..her doc said don't worry its just a cough or cold that is showing up.  Went for a 2nd opinion down to Toledo(one of the wonderful members here on this board recommened this doc)...she suggested we try Falsodex and Herceptin and Zometa...minus the Gemzar...Mind you..Mom was ER/PR positive before the recurrance but they had taken a bone biopsy which had come out Negative for both..as they couldn't reach the liver...My gut feeling and this doc's opinion was..well even if she is 1percent ER/PR positive this should work.  Latest PET scan was done 1 week ago...LIVER is STABLE...lungs there seems to be progression and in the Pelvic region too...What do I make of this.>>Im scared..and tomorrow we go see the original DOC again...I don't know what to "recommend" as far as treatment for him..Is it normal to get progression ..lungs ...I don't know Im scared and Im a rock to my parents...Anyone had a similar situation...??  Should she go back on the Taxol/Gemzar combo along with the Falsodex n others?  Please let me know if Progession is sometimes the case...Im scared worried and crying every single day.
